flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
在老年人当中很受欢迎。
听说绿色的部分越大，
爱好者们的评价就越高。

お年寄りを　中心に　人気。
緑の　部分が　大きいほど
マニアの　評価は　あがるらしい。

Apparently, the larger the green parts of this
Pokémon, the more collectors value it. It’s a
particular favorite among elderly people.

È popolare soprattutto tra gli anziani.
Gli appassionati apprezzano in particolare
quelli con la parte verde più sviluppata.

Es bastante popular entre la gente de mayor
edad. La pasión que le profesan los fanáticos
es proporcional al tamaño de su parte verde.

Es ist vor allem bei alten Leuten beliebt.
Je größer sein Grünanteil, desto mehr wird
es in Fankreisen geschätzt.

Très populaire, notamment chez les personnes
âgées. Plus la partie verte est grande, plus
ses fans se l’arrachent.

很受以老年人為中心的人們歡迎。
聽說綠色的部分越大，
愛好者們的評價就越高。

노인을 중심으로 인기다.
초록색 부분이 클수록
마니아의 평가가 높아지는 듯하다.

おとしよりを　ちゅうしんに　にんき。
みどりの　ぶぶんが　おおきいほど
マニアの　ひょうかは　あがるらしい。

敵に　襲われない　ように　木の　ふりをする。
両手は　１年中　緑色なので
冬は　偽物だと　すぐに　ばれてしまう。

Sudowoodo camouflages itself as a tree to avoid being
attacked by enemies. However, because its hands remain
green throughout the year, the Pokémon is easily identified
as a fake during the winter.

Sudowoodo si camuffa da albero per evitare gli attacchi
nemici. Tuttavia, poiché gli arti superiori sono sempreverdi,
d’inverno viene scoperto facilmente.

Sudowoodo se camufla adoptando la imagen de un árbol para
que no le ataque ningún enemigo. El problema viene en
invierno, ya que las extremidades superiores tienen color verde
y es fácil identificarle.

Mogelbaum tarnt sich als Baum, um Angriffen von Feinden
aus dem Weg zu gehen. Da seine Arme aber das ganze Jahr
über grün bleiben, fällt seine Tarnung im Winter leicht auf.

Simularbre se camoufle en arbre pour éviter d’être attaqué
par ses ennemis. Mais étant donné que ses pattes restent
vertes toute l’année, ce Pokémon est facile à repérer
pendant l’hiver.

적에게 습격당하지 않으려 나무인 척한다.
양손이 일 년 내내 초록빛이라
겨울에는 가짜임이 바로 들통 난다.

てきに　おそわれない　ように　きの　ふりをする。
りょうては　１ねんじゅう　 どりいろなので
ふゆは　にせものだと　すぐに　ばれてしまう。

敵に　襲われない　ように　木の　ふりをする。
両手は　１年中　緑色なので
冬は　偽物だと　すぐに　ばれてしまう。

Sudowoodo camouflages itself as a tree to avoid being
attacked by enemies. However, because its hands remain
green throughout the year, the Pokémon is easily identified
as a fake during the winter.

Sudowoodo si camuffa da albero per evitare gli attacchi
nemici. Tuttavia, poiché gli arti superiori sono sempreverdi,
d’inverno viene scoperto facilmente.

Sudowoodo se camufla adoptando la imagen de un árbol para
que no le ataque ningún enemigo. El problema viene en
invierno, ya que las extremidades superiores tienen color verde
y es fácil identificarle.

Mogelbaum tarnt sich als Baum, um Angriffen von Feinden
aus dem Weg zu gehen. Da seine Arme aber das ganze Jahr
über grün bleiben, fällt seine Tarnung im Winter leicht auf.

Simularbre se camoufle en arbre pour éviter d’être attaqué
par ses ennemis. Mais étant donné que ses pattes restent
vertes toute l’année, ce Pokémon est facile à repérer
pendant l’hiver.

적에게 습격당하지 않으려 나무인 척한다.
양손이 일 년 내내 초록빛이라
겨울에는 가짜임이 바로 들통 난다.

てきに　おそわれない　ように　きの　ふりをする。
りょうては　１ねんじゅう　 どりいろなので
ふゆは　にせものだと　すぐに　ばれてしまう。

襲われないように　木の真似をする。
水が　苦手で　雨が　降り出すと
いつの間にか　姿を　消す。

It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates
water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.

Si traveste da albero per evitare gli attacchi. Odiando
l’acqua, scompare appena inizia a piovere.

Se disfraza de árbol para no ser atacado. Odia el agua,
por lo que desaparecerá si empieza a llover.

Es tarnt sich als Baum, um nicht angegriffen
zu werden. Es hasst Wasser, darum läuft es
bei Regen weg.

Il se déguise en arbre pour éviter les problèmes.
Il déteste l’eau et se cache par temps de pluie.

습격당하지 않도록 나무 흉내를 낸다.
물에 약하기 때문에 비가 내리면
어느 순간에 모습을 감춰버린다.

おそわれないように　きのまねをする。
みずがにがてで　あめが　ふりだすと
いつのまにか　すがたを　けす。

いつも　木のふりを　している。
体の　つくりは　植物より
石や　岩などに　近いようだ。

Although it always pretends to be a tree, its
composition appears more similar to rock than
to vegetation.

Sebbene finga di essere un albero, la composizione
sembra più simile a quella di una roccia.

Aunque pretende ser un árbol, en su composición se
parece más a una roca que a una planta.

Obwohl es vorgibt, ein Baum zu sein, kommt seine
Zusammensetzung einem Stein näher als einer Pflanze.

Il fait semblant d’être un arbre. Sa composition est
en fait plus proche de la pierre.

항상 나무인 척하고 있다.
몸의 구조는 식물보다
돌이나 바위에 가까운 듯하다.

いつも　きのふりを　している。
からだの　つくりは　しょくぶつより
いしや　いわなどに　ちかいようだ。

To avoid being attacked, it does
nothing but mimic a tree. It hates
water and flees from rain.

To avoid being attacked, it does
nothing but mimic a tree. It hates
water and flees from rain.

To avoid being attacked, it does
nothing but mimic a tree. It hates
water and flees from rain.

Il prend l’apparence d’un arbre
pour éviter les attaques, mais il
déteste l’eau et fuit la pluie.

To avoid being attacked, it does
nothing but mimic a tree. It hates
water and flees from rain.

Il prend l’apparence d’un arbre
pour éviter les attaques, mais il
déteste l’eau et fuit la pluie.

It disguises itself as a tree to
avoid attack. It hates water, so it
will disappear if it starts raining.

Although it always pretends to be a
tree, its composition appears more
similar to rock than to vegetation.

To avoid being attacked, it does
nothing but mimic a tree. It hates
water and flees from rain.

It stands along paths pretending
to be a tree. If it starts raining,
it seems to disappear.

Despite appearing to be a tree,
its body is closer to rocks and
stones. It is very weak to water.

Although it always pretends to be a tree,
its composition appears to be closer to a
rock than a plant.

It disguises itself as a tree to avoid
attack. It hates water, so it will
disappear if it starts raining.

It mimics a tree to avoid being attacked
by enemies. But since its forelegs
remain green throughout the year, it is
easily identified as a fake in the winter.

SUDOWOODO camouflages itself as a tree
to avoid being attacked by enemies.
However, because the forelegs remain green throughout the year, the POKéMON
is easily identified as a fake during
the winter.

SUDOWOODO camouflages itself as a tree
to avoid being attacked by enemies.
However, because the forelegs remain green throughout the year, the POKéMON
is easily identified as a fake during
the winter.

If a tree branch
shakes when there
is no wind, it's a SUDOWOODO, not a
tree. It hides
from the rain.

It disguises it­
self as a tree to
avoid attack. It hates water, so it
will disappear if
it starts raining.

Although it always
pretends to be a
tree, its composi­ tion appears to be
closer to a rock
than a plant.
